summary: Like Dwaven armor and weapons? Hate that they suck so bad? well this is the mod for you then adds in new Hero Dwarven Armor for higher levels. All armor and weapons spawn and drop in game like any other loot. There is a full set at Deep Folk Crossing also.
descriptionHtml: Like Dwaven armor and weapons? Hate that they suck so bad? well this is the mod for you then adds in new Hero Dwarven Armor for higher levels. All armor and weapons spawn and drop in game like any other loot. There is a full set at Deep Folk Crossing also.
author: Nosrettac
